content: `Class.WrapDeformer|WrapDeformers` can now attach under layered clothing meshes (for example, `Class.MeshPart|MeshParts` that have `Class.WrapLayer` children instead of just `Class.WrapTarget` children). The difference between the `Class.WrapDeformer` cage and the `Class.WrapLayer` outer cage will deform the mesh before any layered clothing fitting. Layered clothing `Class.MeshPart|MeshParts` deformed through the `Class.WrapDeformer` can be published just like deformed body-part `Class.MeshPart|MeshParts`.
Fixes a bug in the Input Action System where thumbsticks could override other bindings while in the deadzone.
Loads Pathfinding Tiles by Bounding cylinder of the FindPath Extent.

Adds the property `Class.Stats.MemoryTrackingEnabled`. This property checks the validity of the `Class.Stats:GetMemoryUsageMbForTag()` and `Class.Stats:GetMemoryUsageMbAllCategories()` methods, and the validity of the memory information in the Memory tab of the MicroProfiler and the Developer Console.
Fixes UV issues on SLIM built-in materials
Adds a "Custom" option for particle flipbook layouts, allowing you to define custom numbers of columns and rows.
Luau's New Type Solver: suppresses errors for overloads with arities that don't match the function call.
Allows 255 highlights in one scene.
Improves Decal support for SLIM.
Adds preview for `Class.AudioPlayer.AudioContent`.
Luau's New Type Solver: updates primitive tables to be subtypes of generic tables.

Using Luau 'pcall' and 'xpcall' functions no longer counts towards the C call stack limit, extending potential recursion depth with protected calls from 200 to 20000 (note that 'pcall'/'xpcall' call itself still counts towards the Luau call stack limit).
Luau's New Type Solver: refining tables with indexers against external types (such as builtin Roblox types) no longer drops the table portion.
Luau's New Type Solver: fixes an issue where iterating over a function that returns an empty pack would cause type inference to fail to complete.

MicroProfiler counters now display a breakdown of Luau Heap memory use of each DataModel and VM group. Additionally, execution time of each VM will be displayed. 'lua/heap' group has been split into 'Luau/heap' and 'Luau/heap_core' to exclude plugin and core script memory use from the existing memory category.
The `Class.GuiObject.MouseEnter` signal no longer fires before `Class.GuiObject.MouseLeave` when you quickly move the mouse from one `Class.GuiObject` to another `Class.GuiObject`.
Renames `Enum.DeveloperMemoryTag.PhysicsParts` to `Enum.DeveloperMemoryTag.BaseParts`.
Fixes simulation slowdown when adding and removing child instances.
Allows entity based culling of Models set as `StreamingMesh`.
BillboardGui CurrentDistance and DistanceStep are now properly implemented according to the documentation.  Properties DistanceLowerLimit, and DistanceUpperLimit will now be officially deprecated.
A UIScale object now correctly scales its parent ImageLabel or ImageButton without affecting the TileSize property.
Fixes an issue that could cause pasted Shirt and Pants instances to desync their ShirtTemplate and PantsTemplate properties in Team Create.
Fixes an issue where zoom level gets reset in vehicles and VR cameras upon `PreferredInput` changing.
`Class.AirController` now adjusts to `Class.ControllerManager.UpDirection` changes, even while active.
Fixes an issue with Multiple Replication Foci that can prevent stream out of regions in some situations.
Microprofiler no longer incurs additional CPU overhead when turned off when previously enabled in the same client session.
Fixes InputActionSytem Direction3D forward/backward to use right handed coordinate system.
Fixes issue where modified attributes on the root of a package were not showing up in bold.
